directions: [["In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium high heat. Pour in the couscous and cook until lightly toasted, stirring frequently for about 2-3 minutes."],["Add the chicken broth, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt and pepper and stir to combine. Bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer about 8 minutes â€“ until the couscous is al dente."],["Stir in the Parmesan cheese, scallions, peas and chicken and mix until well combined. Serve immediately with additional Parmesan cheese grated on top if desired."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
